entry.title: Proof-of-work based signet faucet
entry.summary:
The recent update introduces a significant incentive for users in the form of an ability to claim coins on the mainnet, highlighted by a specific transaction which can be viewed at [mempool.space](https://mempool.space/tx/aba3c2ae442aa20150996ee68f9aa4da83b57a4312891078be0c2e68c50b2801). This development marks an evolution in how transactions and operations within this space can be conducted, offering a more interactive and engaging framework for users.
Moreover, this update allows for the appending of a Proof of Work challenge to any output script. This feature not only enhances the security measures but also contributes to the flexibility and adaptability of the platform. It opens up new avenues for user participation and interaction, ensuring that the system remains robust and resilient against potential threats. This integration of Proof of Work challenges signifies a thoughtful approach towards maintaining the integrity and trustworthiness of the system, making it a noteworthy advancement in the platform's capabilities.
